stickers.name: nian_chili
stickers.alt: Nian chews as she holds a chili up in her left hand with chopsticks.

stickers.name: nian_celebrate
stickers.alt: Nian cheers with her arms in the air as fireworks and explosions go off in the background.

stickers.name: snowsant_swet
stickers.alt: Snowsant sheepishly clutches a red envelope. She sweats in a panic and smiles a bit, like she's been caught having financial difficulty.

stickers.name: snowsant_doctor_coins
stickers.alt: Snowsant looks at a coin she picked up, surprised that it's real money. Another coin is at her feet, along with more coins on the ground creating a trail toward the trap the Doctor has set with a basket, propped up with a stick. The Doctor sits on a rock beside the trap, ready to pull the string and close the trap.

stickers.name: aak_threat
stickers.alt: Aak grins menacingly as he holds up a syringe in his right hand. His left arm seems to be holding the viewer in place.

stickers.name: aak_kidnap
stickers.alt: Aak looks like a deer in headlights as he is caught red-handed by Kal'tsit in the middle of kidnapping Doctor. Only Kal'tsit's arm is visible, where her right hand is clenched in a fist with an angry vein popping out. The Doctor is tied up with duct tape, a piece of tape covering their mouth over their helmet.

stickers.name: hung_sheepish
stickers.alt: Hung sheepishly smiles as he scratches the back of his head with his left hand.

stickers.name: hung_discipline
stickers.alt: Hung puts his left hand on his hip, giving a sense of reassurance. Hung's right hand is clenched into a fist that bonks Aak over the head, squishing him down, which is presumably his punishment for mischief.

stickers.name: swire_gift
stickers.alt: Swire beams as she holds a pouch in her right hand. In her left hand, she holds out a red envelope to the viewer.

stickers.name: jessica_celebrate
stickers.alt: Jessica smiles as she fires a gun, causing confetti and streamers to pop out.

stickers.name: amiya_lancet_snowman
stickers.alt: Lancet-2 sits in front of Amiya, a pile of snow on top of them. The pile of snow has been decorated like a snowman's head, with two twigs as horns. Amiya wraps a scarf around the base of the snow pile, giving the snowman a scarf.

stickers.name: liskarm_franka_flash
stickers.alt: Liskarm holds up her shield at Franka, blinding Franka with an incredibly bright flash. Franka recoils at the flash, trying to cover her eyes with her hands.
